00033 #ifndef ARM_TIMER_H
00034 #define ARM_TIMER_H
00035 
00036 #include "rum_types.h"

00044 //------------------------ SAM7X ----------------------------------------------
00045 #define TC_BASE         0xFFFA0000          
00046 #define TC1_ID          13                  
00047 #define PID13           0x00002000          
00048 #define TC1_CCR         *(volatile unsigned long*)(TC_BASE + 0x40)    
00049 #define TC_CLKDIS       0x00000002          
00050 #define TC1_CMR         *(volatile unsigned long*)(TC_BASE + 0x44)    
00051 #define TC_CLKS         0x00000007          
00052 #define TC_CLKS_MCK2    0x00000000          
00053 //#define TC_CLKS_MCK8    0x00000001          
00054 //#define TC_CLKS_MCK32   0x00000002          
00055 //#define TC_CLKS_MCK128  0x00000003          
00056 //#define TC_CLKS_MCK1024 0x00000004          
00057 //#define TC_CLKS_XC0     0x00000005          
00058 //#define TC_CLKS_XC1     0x00000006          
00059 //#define TC_CLKS_XC2     0x00000007          
00060 //#define TC_CLKI         0x00000008          
00061 //#define TC_BURST        0x00000030          
00062 //#define TC_BURST_NONE   0x00000000          
00063 //#define TC_BUSRT_XC0    0x00000010          
00064 //#define TC_BURST_XC1    0x00000020          
00065 //#define TC_BURST_XC2    0x00000030          
00066 #define TC_CPCTRG       0x00004000          
00067 #define TC_WAVE         0x00008000          
00068 //#define TC_CAPT         0x00000000          
00069 //#define TC_EEVT         0x00000C00          
00070 //#define TC_EEVT_TIOB    0x00000000          
00071 //#define TC_EEVT_XC0     0x00000400          
00072 #define TC_EEVT_XC1     0x00000800          
00073 //#define TC_EEVT_XC2     0x00000C00          
00074 #define TC_BCPC_TOGGLE_OUTPUT   0x0C000000      
00075 #define TC1_IER         *(volatile unsigned long*)(TC_BASE + 0x64)    
00076 #define TC1_IDR         *(volatile unsigned long*)(TC_BASE + 0x68)    
00077 #define TC_CPCS         0x00000010          
00078 #define TC1_SR          *(volatile unsigned long*)(TC_BASE + 0x60)        
00079 #define TC1_RC          *(volatile unsigned long*)(TC_BASE + 0x5C)        
00080 #define TC_CLKEN        0x00000001              
00081 #define TC_SWTRG        0x00000004              
00084 #define AIC_BASE        0xFFFFF000          
00085 #define AIC_SVR(i)      (*(volatile unsigned long*)(AIC_BASE + 0x80 + i * 4))
00086 #define AIC_SMR(i)      (*(volatile unsigned long*)(AIC_BASE + i * 4))
00087 
00088 #define AIC_SRCTYPE_INT_EDGE_TRIGGERED  0x00000020      
00091 void ApiTimerIntr(void);
00092 void timerInit_arm(void);
00093 void timerStart_arm(void);
00094 u8 macSetAlarm_arm(u16 microseconds, void(*callback)(void));
00095 void macTimerEnd_arm(u8 ID);
00096 
00097 // Definitions for ARM target to compile (and for Doxygen to not have conflicts)
00098 #define timerInit   timerInit_arm
00099 #define timerStart  timerStart_arm
00100 #define macSetAlarm macSetAlarm_arm
00101 #define macTimerEnd macTimerEnd_arm
